title: Lisa Rawlings, EMBA 19, on leadership & social impact in a more diverse, equitable, and inclusive America
author: Natasha Payes
excerpt:
OneHaas is a podcast that tells the stories of Haas alumni. Lisa Rawlings, EMBA 19, speaks with OneHaas Podcast creator and host Sean Li to talk about her vision and goals as the new president and CEO of the National Urban Fellows (NUF) OrganizationNational Urban Fellows is a rigorous, full-time graduate program comprised of two [â¦]
